content: Before we begin, I’d like to remind everyone that certain of the statements during this call, including without limitation, statements regarding revenue, expenses, income and general growth of our business, may constitute forward-looking statements within the meaning of the Safe Harbor provisions of Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933 as amended and Section 21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 as amended. If you look at the subset of these facilities that have stabilized under the definition of being at 80% occupancy for the last 2 years, those locations’ occupancy increased about 280 basis points to 96.5%.
